meanings.sent1: The church bells clangouring woke up the entire town.
meanings.sent2: The construction site was clangouring with the sound of hammers and drills.
meanings.sent3: The noisy parrot started clangouring just as I was about to take a nap.
meanings.sent4: The thunderstorm outside was clangouring like a symphony of drums.
meanings.sent5: The alarm clock clangouring in the morning was impossible to ignore.

meanings.sent1: The clangouring of the fire alarm sent everyone into a panic.
meanings.sent2: The clangouring of the wind chimes soothed her as she sat on the porch.
meanings.sent3: The clangouring of the old piano keys made the room feel alive.
meanings.sent4: The clangouring of the gong signaled the start of the ceremony.
meanings.sent5: The clangouring of the metal gate echoed through the empty street.
